title: Never Satisfied
lyrics: No matter what you do, it's never enough
I don't understand these bitches, Drizzy
I'm tryin', though
Half of these niggas ain't never satisfied
(Here's 7 Woman's size sneers for the season)
Time after time after time
Money's all I get and there's still money on my mind
But I ain't never satisfied, yeah
I ain't never satisfied, yeah
I find a one and say I'll never cheat again
We don't talk for like some months, I end up fuckin' with her friend
I ain't never satisfied, yeah
I ain't never satisfied, yeah, yeah
I'm puttin' pressure on these niggas and I know
But I still be on the road like I'm scared of goin' broke
'Cause I ain't never satisfied, yeah
I ain't never satisfied
I guess it's a lot of money in the room
I gotta find another spot to hide the soon
I mix the Ros√© with the purple juice
I hustle every day and you don't have a clue
After you get money and all your dreams come true
It's like everything that's around you get brand new
I can't never forget the struggle and I paid dues
Can't let the money and the fame come between my crew
My pain still runnin' deeper than the ocean
Order up ten thousand ones and I throw it
Name a bag in the store that you ain't got
Name a designer store that we ain't shop
They ain't never satisfied
Time after time after time
Money's all I get and there's still money on my mind
But I ain't never satisfied, yeah
I ain't never satisfied, yeah
I find a one and say I'll never cheat again
We don't talk for like some months, I end up fuckin' with her friend
I ain't never satisfied, yeah
I ain't never satisfied, yeah, yeah
